attributes.action: request that HM Queen Elizabeth II dissolve the UK Parliament immediately.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It being the feeling and opinion of the country that the current, demonstrably venal, condition of Parliament and its members, justifies the monarch exercising her rights to dissolve Parliament and call a general election, so that the will of the people be made known, we, the undersigned call upon Her Majesty the Queen to exercise those rights.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
